title: Proposal of MST Next Gen
description: MST Next Gen has been proposed as a project to increase the engagement of the community with Marian Street Theatre. Once the theatre re-opens, we hope that this website will be a hub for the theatre community and any events.

title: Council approves Marian Street Theatre to start construction!
description: The council has recently approved the building plans for Marian Street Theatre, with an estimated opening date in 2024
